item.title: Amy add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Amy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Amy add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Amy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Amy add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Amy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Amy add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Amy add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Amy add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "I just got out of the hospital. I was in a speed reading accident. I hit a book mark and flew across the room." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Amy add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Amy add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "Right now I’m having amnesia and déjà vu at the same time. I think I’ve forgotten this before." -- Steven Wright

item.title: Amy add a quote by steven wright
item.description: "If it's a penny for your thoughts and you put in your two cents worth, then someone, somewhere is making a penny." -- steven wright

item.title: Amy add a quote by Steven Wright
item.description: "What's another word for thesaurus?" -- Steven Wright

item.title: Amy add a quote by Orhan Pamuk
item.description: "Most of the time it's not the Europeans who belittle us. What happens when we look at them is that we belittle ourselves. When we undertake the pilgrimage, it's not just to escape the tyranny at home but also to reach to the depths of our souls. The day arrives when the guilty must return to save those who could not find the courage to leave." -- Orhan Pamuk

item.title: Amy add a quote by Donna Lynn Hope
item.description: "Thank God for men who manage to hold from afar, wipe tears away with tender words and dish out the life force that is hope. She has never felt so alone but out there, across an ocean, and in a foreign land, there is a man who loves her and would lay down his life just so she could feel the light once again." -- Donna Lynn Hope

item.title: Amy add a quote by Donna Lynn Hope
item.description: "It will be a welcome change for her to feel his hands on her hips and his breath in her hair; She's been forlorn, but like all emotions, even loneliness doesn't last. She has fallen in love with the man with the quiet strength, the confident humility and the hands that show the flame of the heart." -- Donna Lynn Hope

item.title: Amy add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description:
"simply-quotes Follow
I close my eyes, thinking that there is nothing like an embrace after an absence, nothing like fitting my face into the curve of his shoulder and filling my lungs with the scent of him." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Amy add a quote by Donna Lynn Hope
item.description: "I don't cry because we've been separated by distance, and for a matter of years. Why? Because for as long as we share the same sky and breathe the same air, we're still together." -- Donna Lynn Hope
